DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomize placebo-controlled double blind clinical trial conduct Ain Shams University maternity Hospital include 120 woman diagnose clomiphene citrate resistant polycystic ovary syndrome . After laparoscopic ovarian drilling , randomize either receive 50 mg oral clomiphene citrate twice daily oral NAC 1,200 mg/day 5 day start cycle day 2 cycle day 6 ( group 1 = 60 patient ) clomiphene citrate ( group 2 = 60 patient ) . The primary outcome biochemical pregnancy rate , secondary outcome include Clinical pregnancy rate , ovulation rate , live birth rate , number follicle ≥ 18 mm endometrial thickness trigger ovulation , mid- luteal sub-endometrial blood flow index , incidence side effect .
DOC.brief_title: NAC CC Resistant PCOS After LOD
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 25 30 Kg/m 2 . CCresistant Polycystic ovary syndrome • Patients BMI 25 30 Kg/m 2 . Hyper hypothyroidism , hyperprolactinemia . Current previous ( within last six month ) use oral contraceptive , glucocorticoid , antiandrogens , antidiabetic antiobesity drug hormonal drug . Intention start diet specific program physical activity . Organic pelvic disease . Tubal male factor infertility . Interval earlier treatment fertility drug less 6 month . Contraindication either : Clomiphene citrate : liver disease , undiagnosed abnormal uterine bleeding , uterine fibroid , endometrial cancer , ovarian enlargement hyper stimulation HCG injection : ovarian enlargement hyper stimulation
